trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: ForEach-Object
trans-unit.target: ForEach-Object

trans-unit.source: ForEach-Object
trans-unit.target: ForEach-Object

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Performs an operation against each item in a collection of input objects.
trans-unit.target: 針對輸入物件集合中的每個項目執行操作。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: ScriptBlockSet (Default)
trans-unit.target: ScriptBlockSet （預設值）

trans-unit.source: PropertyAndMethodSet
trans-unit.target: PropertyAndMethodSet

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **ForEach-Object** cmdlet performs an operation on each item in a collection of input objects.
trans-unit.target: **Foreach-object** cmdlet 會執行輸入物件的集合中的每個項目上的作業。

trans-unit.source: The input objects can be piped to the cmdlet or specified by using the InputObject parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用管線將輸入物件傳送至 Cmdlet，或使用 InputObject 參數來指定輸入物件。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, there are two different ways to construct a **ForEach-Object** command.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows PowerShell 3.0 開始，有兩種不同的方式來建構 **Foreach-object** 命令。

trans-unit.source: **Script block**.
trans-unit.target: **指令碼區塊**。

trans-unit.source: You can use a script block to specify the operation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用指令碼區塊來指定操作。

trans-unit.source: Within the script block, use the $_ variable to represent the current object.
trans-unit.target: 在指令碼區塊內，請使用 $_ 變數來代表目前的物件。

trans-unit.source: The script block is the value of the **Process** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼區塊是值 **程序** 參數。

trans-unit.source: The script block can contain any Windows PowerShell script.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼區塊可以包含任何 Windows PowerShell 指令碼。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command gets the value of the **ProcessName** property of each process on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列命令會取得的值 **ProcessName** 的電腦上的每個處理序的屬性。

trans-unit.source: **Operation statement**.
trans-unit.target: **運算陳述式**。

trans-unit.source: You can also write a operation statement, which is much more like natural language.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以撰寫較像自然語言的操作陳述式。

trans-unit.source: You can use the operation statement to specify a property value or call a method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用操作陳述式來指定屬性值或呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: Operation statements were introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 操作陳述式是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中導入。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command also gets the value of the **ProcessName** property of each process on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列命令也會取得的值 **ProcessName** 的電腦上的每個處理序的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When using the script block format, in addition to using the script block that describes the operations that are performed on each input object, you can provide two additional script blocks.
trans-unit.target: 使用指令碼區塊格式時，除了使用描述在每個輸入物件上執行之操作的指令碼區塊之外，您還可以提供兩個額外的指令碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: The Begin script block, which is the value of the **Begin** parameter, runs before the first input object is processed.
trans-unit.target: Begin 指令碼區塊中，這是值的 **開始** 參數，在處理第一個輸入的物件之前執行。

trans-unit.source: The End script block, which is the value of the **End** parameter, runs after the last input object is processed.
trans-unit.target: 結束指令碼區塊，這是值的 **結束** 參數，會在處理最後一個輸入的物件之後執行。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: This command takes an array of three integers and divides each one of them by 1024.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會接受三個整數的陣列，並將它們每個都除以 1024。

trans-unit.source: This command gets the files and directories in the Windows PowerShell installation directory ($pshome) and passes them to the ForEach-Object cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此命令取得 Windows PowerShell 安裝目錄 ($pshome) 中的檔案和目錄，並將它們傳遞給 ForEach-Object Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: If the object is not a directory (the value of the PSISContainer property is false), the script block gets the name of the file, divides the value of its Length property by 1024, and adds a space ("") to separate it from the next entry.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件不是目錄 (PSISContainer 屬性的值為 false)，指令碼區塊會取得檔案的名稱、將其 Length 屬性的值除以 1024，然後加上一個空格 ("") 來將它與下一個項目分開。

trans-unit.source: This command gets the 1000 most recent events from the System event log and stores them in the $Events variable.
trans-unit.target: 此命令從 System 事件記錄檔取得 1000 個最新事件，並將它們儲存在 $Events 變數中。

trans-unit.source: It then pipes the events to the **ForEach-Object** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 要的事件，然後使用管線傳送 **Foreach-object** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: The **Begin** parameter displays the current date and time.
trans-unit.target: **開始** 參數會顯示目前的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: Next, the **Process** parameter uses the **Out-File** cmdlet to create a text file named events.txt and stores the message property of each of the events in that file.
trans-unit.target: 下一步] **程序** 參數會使用 **Out-file** 名為 events.txt 指令程式來建立文字檔案，並儲存該檔案中的每一個事件的訊息屬性。

trans-unit.source: Last, the **End** parameter is used to display the date and time after all of the processing has completed.
trans-unit.target: 最後， **結束** 參數用來顯示日期和時間在所有的處理已完成。

trans-unit.source: This command changes the value of the **RemotePath** registry entry in all of the subkeys under the HKCU:\Network key to uppercase text.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令的值變更 **RemotePath** 中所有的子機碼為大寫文字 hkcu: \network 機碼下的登錄項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use this format to change the form or content of a registry entry value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個格式來變更登錄項目值的形式或內容。

trans-unit.source: Each subkey in the **Network** key represents a mapped network drive that will reconnect at logon.
trans-unit.target: 在每個子機碼 **網路** 索引鍵所代表對應的網路磁碟機將在登入時重新連線。

trans-unit.source: The **RemotePath** entry contains the UNC path of the connected drive.
trans-unit.target: **RemotePath** 項目會包含連線的磁碟機的 UNC 路徑。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you map the E: drive to \\\\Server\Share, there will be an E subkey of HKCU:\Network and the value of the **RemotePath** registry entry in the E subkey will be \\\\Server\Share.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您將對應的 e︰ 磁碟機 \\\\多，會有 hkcu: \network E 子機碼和值 **RemotePath** E 子機碼中的登錄項目會是 \\\\伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Get-ItemProperty cmdlet to get all of the subkeys of the **Network** key and the Set-ItemProperty cmdlet to change the value of the **RemotePath** registry entry in each key.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用 Get-itemproperty cmdlet 取得所有的子機碼 **網路** 索引鍵和 Set-itemproperty cmdlet 變更的值 **RemotePath** 每個機碼的登錄項目。

trans-unit.source: In the **Set-ItemProperty** command, the path is the value of the **PSPath** property of the registry key.
trans-unit.target: 在 **Set-itemproperty** 命令時，路徑是值 **PSPath** 登錄機碼的屬性。

trans-unit.source: (This is a property of the Microsoft .NET Framework object that represents the registry key; it is not a registry entry.) The command uses the ToUpper() method of the RemotePath value, which is a string (REG_SZ).
trans-unit.target: (這是一個代表登錄機碼之 Microsoft. NET Framework 物件的屬性；它不是一個登錄項目)。命令使用 RemotePath 值 (字串 (REG_SZ)) 的 ToUpper() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Because **Set-ItemProperty** is changing the property of each key, the **ForEach-Object** cmdlet is required to access the property.
trans-unit.target: 因為 **Set-itemproperty** 正在變更的屬性，每個索引鍵， **Foreach-object** 指令程式，才可存取的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example shows the effect of piping the $null automatic variable to the **ForEach-Object** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範的管線 $null 自動變數來影響 **Foreach-object** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: Because Windows PowerShell treats null as an explicit placeholder, the **ForEach-Object** cmdlet generates a value for $null, just as it does for other objects that you pipe to it.
trans-unit.target: 因為 Windows PowerShell 會將 null 視為明確的預留位置， **Foreach-object** 指令程式會產生值為 $null，就如同您使用管線傳送至其他物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the $null automatic variable, see about_Automatic_Variables.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 $null 自動變數的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Automatic_Variables。

trans-unit.source: These commands gets the value of the **Path** property of all installed Windows PowerShell modules.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令取得的值 **路徑** 屬性的所有已安裝的 Windows PowerShell 模組。

trans-unit.source: They use the **MemberName** parameter to specify the **Path** property of modules.
trans-unit.target: 他們使用 **MemberName** 參數來指定 **路徑** 模組的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The second command is equivalent to the first.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令同等於第一個命令。

trans-unit.source: It uses the **Foreach** alias of the **Foreach-Object** cmdlet and omits the name of the **MemberName** parameter, which is optional.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 **Foreach** 別名 **Foreach-object** 指令程式，並省略名稱 **MemberName** 參數是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: The **ForEach-Object** cmdlet is very useful for getting property values, because it gets the value without changing the type, unlike the **Format** cmdlets or the Select-Object cmdlet, which change the property value type.
trans-unit.target: **Foreach-object** 指令程式是對於取得屬性值非常有用，因為它取得的值而不需要變更與不同的型別， **格式** 指令程式或變更屬性的 Select-object 指令程式實值型別。

trans-unit.source: These commands split two dot-separated module names into their component names.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令將兩個以點分隔的模組名稱分割成其元件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The commands call the **Split** method of strings.
trans-unit.target: 命令呼叫 **分割** 方法的字串。

trans-unit.source: The three commands use different syntax, but they are equivalent and interchangeable.
trans-unit.target: 這三個命令使用不同的語法，但它們是相等的並且可交換使用。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the traditional syntax, which includes a script block and the current object operator ($_).
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令使用傳統語法，其中包含指令碼區塊和目前物件運算子 ($_)。

trans-unit.source: It uses the dot syntax to specify the method and parentheses to enclose the delimiter argument.
trans-unit.target: 它使用點語法來指定要括住分隔符號引數的方法和括號。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the **MemberName** parameter to specify the **Split** method and the **ArgumentName** parameter to identify the dot (".") as the split delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令會使用 **MemberName** 參數來指定 **分割** 方法和 **ArgumentName** 參數來識別該點 ("。") 為分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: The third command uses the **Foreach** alias of the **Foreach-Object** cmdlet and omits the names of the **MemberName** and **ArgumentList** parameters, which are optional.
trans-unit.target: 第三個命令會使用 **Foreach** 別名 **Foreach-object** 指令程式，並省略名稱 **MemberName** 和 **ArgumentList** 是選擇性的參數。

trans-unit.source: The output of these three commands, shown below, is identical.
trans-unit.target: 這三個命令的輸出 (如下所示) 完全相同。

trans-unit.source: **Split** is just one of many useful methods of strings.
trans-unit.target: **分割** 只是其中一個字串的許多有用的方法。

trans-unit.source: To see all of the properties and methods of strings, pipe a string to the Get-Member cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的所有屬性和方法的字串，透過管道傳送至 Get-member 指令程式的字串。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -ArgumentList
trans-unit.target: -ArgumentList

trans-unit.source: Specifies the arguments to a method call.
trans-unit.target: 指定方法呼叫的引數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -Begin
trans-unit.target: -開始

trans-unit.source: Specifies a script block that runs before processing any input objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定在處理任何輸入物件之前執行的指令碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -End
trans-unit.target: -結束

trans-unit.source: Specifies a script block that runs after processing all input objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定在處理所有輸入物件之後執行的指令碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: -InputObject
trans-unit.target: -InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies the input objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定輸入物件。

trans-unit.source: ForEach-Object runs the script block or operation statement on each input object.
trans-unit.target: ForEach-Object 會在每個輸入物件上執行指令碼區塊或操作陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains the objects, or type a command or expression that gets the objects.
trans-unit.target: 輸入包含物件的變數，或輸入可取得物件的命令或運算式。

trans-unit.source: When you use the InputObject parameter with ForEach-Object, instead of piping command results to ForEach-Object, the InputObject value-even if the value is a collection that is the result of a command, such as -InputObject (Get-Process)-is treated as a single object.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 InputObject 參數與 Foreach-object，而不是管線命令結果至 Foreach-object 時，InputObject 值即使值是結果的命令，例如-InputObject (Get-process) 的集合-會被視為單一物件。

trans-unit.source: Because InputObject cannot return individual properties from an array or collection of objects, it is recommended that if you use ForEach-Object to perform operations on a collection of objects for those objects that have specific values in defined properties, you use ForEach-Object in the pipeline, as shown in the examples in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 因為 InputObject 無法從物件陣列或集合傳回個別屬性，因此建議您若使用 ForEach-Object 在物件集合上執行操作，以找出在定義的屬性中具有特定值的物件，可以在管線中使用 ForEach-Object，如這個主題的範例所示。

trans-unit.source: -MemberName
trans-unit.target: -MemberName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the property to get or the method to call.
trans-unit.target: 指定要取得的屬性或要呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are permitted, but work only if the resulting string resolves to a unique value.
trans-unit.target: 萬用字元所允許的但產生的字串會解析為唯一的值時，才有作用。

trans-unit.source: If, for example, you run Get-Process | ForEach -MemberName *Name, and more than one member exists with a name that contains the string Name--such as the ProcessName and Name properties--the command fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果，比方說，您執行 Get-process |ForEach MemberName * 名稱，以及多個成員存在的名稱包含字串名稱--例如 ProcessName 和 Name 屬性-命令失敗。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -Process
trans-unit.target: 同處理序

trans-unit.source: Specifies the operation that is performed on each input object.
trans-unit.target: 指定在每個輸入物件上執行的操作。

trans-unit.source: Enter a script block that describes the operation.
trans-unit.target: 輸入描述操作的指令碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: -RemainingScripts
trans-unit.target: -RemainingScripts

trans-unit.source: Takes all script blocks that are not taken by the **Process** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接受所有的指令碼區塊不會採取的 **程序** 參數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: 未執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.PSObject
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.PSObject

trans-unit.source: You can pipe any object to ForEach-Object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用管線將任何物件傳送至 ForEach-Object。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.PSObject
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.PSObject

trans-unit.source: The objects that ForEach-Object returns are determined by the input.
trans-unit.target: ForEach-Object 傳回的物件取決於輸入。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: The **ForEach-Object** cmdlet works much like the **Foreach** statement, except that you cannot pipe input to a **Foreach** statement.
trans-unit.target: **Foreach-object** cmdlet 的運作方式很像 **Foreach** 陳述式中，不同之處在於您無法透過管道傳送輸入 **Foreach** 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the **Foreach** statement, see about_Foreach (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113229).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊 **Foreach** 陳述式，請參閱 about_Foreach (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113229)。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結
